table_description: Billing history is a record of billing events for your account. For example, entries may include events like payments made, invoices issued, or credits granted.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Time the billing history entry occured.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Amount of the billing history entry.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Description of the billing history entry.

columns.name: invoice_id
columns.description: ID of the invoice associated with the billing history entry, if applicable.

columns.name: invoice_uuid
columns.description: UUID of the invoice associated with the billing history entry, if applicable.
